title: What to Read This Week
sub_head: The rowdy years of late-19th century American politics, the genius of Poirot, a novel of buried memory from Cynthia Ozick, a physicistâ€™s creation story and more.
body:
Late 19th-century electioneering included both parades and brickbats. Voter turnout was high. Review by Michael Barone.
Read the review

Before his film career, the legendary director made the most of life as a freelance reporter. Review by Jeremy McCarter.
